revision.text: Possibly: A system of revealed religion, digested under proper heads, and composed in the express words of Scripture : containing all that the sacred records reveal, with respect to doctrine and duty / by the late Reverend John Warden, M.A. ; revised and published by his son the Reverend John Warden, minister of the Gospel in Canongate. (Edinburgh : Printed for Edward and Charles Dilly in the Poultry, M,DCC,LXIX [1769]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1855385~S1
